# fivethirtyeightdata

`fivethirtyeightdata` is an add-on R data package that contains the large datasets not found in the original [`fivethirtyeight`](https://github.com/rudeboybert/fivethirtyeight) package, published by FiveThirtyEight \url{https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data}.

The released version of this package is hosted using a [drat](https://github.com/fivethirtyeightdata/drat) repository made using the the `drat` package.

For more on using these data, see the GitHub repository for the `fivethirtyeight` package.
